projects.title: Sinhala Note Summarizer
projects.description: Built a mobile app to summarize Sinhala notes using image text extraction and AI-powered summarization.

projects.title: Event Ticketing Simulator
projects.description: Developed a real-time ticket transaction system simulating producer-consumer patterns with multithreading.

projects.title: Estate Agent Platform
projects.description: Created a feature-rich estate management system with persistent data storage in the browser.

projects.title: Student Management System
projects.description: Developed a Student and their module management system using core Java

projects.title: Personal Finance Tracker
projects.description: Developed a python CLI and Tkinter GUI application for tracking personal finances.

projects.title: SDG-Themed Website
projects.description: Designed a website promoting Sustainable Development Goals with interactive features and modern styling.
